snippet: The original trophy is locked up at an undisclosed location and has been insured for $1 million. Clones weighing 60 to 75 pounds have taken its place at the awards ceremony.
abstract: Original Heisman Trophy, first awarded in 1935, is kept in undisclosed location in Lower Manhattan; replicas of bronze original are made each year for winning college football player and their school, as well as for marketing purposes.
lead_paragraph: The original trophy is locked up at an undisclosed location and has been insured for $1 million. Clones weighing 60 to 75 pounds have taken its place at the awards ceremony.

headline.main: With Heisman Trophy Tucked Away, Spotlight Falls on Look-Alikes
headline.print_headline: With Heisman Tucked Away, Spotlight Falls on Look-Alikes
